column1: 4446,Incredible Hulk (1999) #96,96,49202,45,"On the run from the Imperial Army after escaping from the Great Arena, the Hulk and his crew of Warbound gladiators take refuge in a small farming village with a dark secret.  Learn the horrifying truth about Miek's past-and discover if our heroes know the difference between justice and revenge!  The smashing continues!!! ",
